title: Usually i would be over the moon about something like this, except
body:
So, i have a few up and down games playing on-hit jungle nocturne, i finish a worlds mission, which in turn gives me enough to get a worlds orb, which i then forge
https://i.imgur.com/O9c6ofc.png
except
https://i.imgur.com/6OJqbrf.png
rito plz, why me

replies.body:
Every honour capsule I've opened has been a 450 ip champ shard for a champ that I already own, please find something else to complain about.

"This sucks, I got a free Ferrari but I already own one."

collect said shards, wait till you have all the champs up to 4800 in cost
reroll all of them into champ perm
??? 
profit

You get so much orange essence for it thoooo. Like yeah it sucks that you already bought it, but you got to have the skin for all this time, and now you'll have enough essence to get almost 2 skins for free :) Small victories friend.
